title: Yamakawa Junichi Anime Gekijou
synopsis: Masaki Michishita, a gay boy attending a preparatory school, finds himself having the urge to pee. He races to the nearest toilet that happens to be in a park, famous for being a gay meet-up spot. He notices Takakazu Abe sitting on a bench in the park and without thinking he says, “Uho! That’s a good man…” As they stare at each other, Takakazu starts unzipping his blue jumpsuit…
